description: In Microsoft Edge, you can easily check the version of the browser to ensure that you have the latest security updates applied, addressing any vulnerabilities such as CVE-2023-6351. To view the version information, click on the three dots (...) located at the top right corner of the window. Next, select 'Help and feedback' from the dropdown menu and then click on 'About Microsoft Edge'. This will display the version number and ensure that you are using the most recent version that benefits from any safety patches. Keeping the browser updated is crucial for maintaining security and performance.
